text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg You pompous idiotic hypocritical #Tory tw*t. How is putting that child & one parent in a car for 5 hours with other parentc onfirmed as having #COVID19 ensuring they are safe at all times?! Regardless of politics that is the conduct of an appalling father. #SackDominicCummings
